sentence.Network_en: I bet Sue gave you an earful when you got home.
sentence.Network_cn: 我敢说你到家时休肯定训了你一顿。

sentence.Network_en: She gave me an earful about her husband's infidelities.
sentence.Network_cn: 她滔滔不绝地对我说有关她丈夫外遇的事.

sentence.Network_en: They can expect an earful on what the slump is doing economically.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们将因商业不景气对经济所产生的影响而受到严厉的训斥.

entry.def: If you say that you got an earful, you mean that someone spoke angrily to you for quite a long time.

example.ex: I bet Sue gave you an earful when you got home.
example.tran: 我敢说你到家时休肯定训了你一顿。

auth_sentence.content: Inside, the Prime Minister received an "earful" from the health professionals.
auth_sentence.res_content: Inside, the Prime Minister received an "earful" from the health professionals.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Inside, the Prime Minister received an "earful" from the health professionals.

auth_sentence.content: But then some crabby old folks got on the phone and gave the politicians an earful.
auth_sentence.res_content: But then some crabby old folks got on the phone and gave the politicians an earful.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But then some crabby old folks got on the phone and gave the politicians an earful.

auth_sentence.content: It might be tempting to give the boss an earful if you leave, but the way you quit has an impact on your career.
auth_sentence.res_content: It might be tempting to give the boss an earful if you leave, but the way you quit has an impact on your career.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It might be tempting to give the boss an earful if you leave, but the way you quit has an impact on your career.
